_comment.1: The purpose of this file is to supply a few options that aren't easy to provide on the command line.
_comment.2: If a particular option is not needed, do not delete it. Instead, return it/leave it in its default state.
_comment.3: Empty values do not affect the behaviour of the program.
_comment.4: This configuration file can be used to set some or all of the following options: proxies, headers, cookies and JSON POST data.
